ygData.subject: Re: Pls explain AC
ygData.msgSnippet: I have also noticed that the penalty is based off fractions of a pound. My AC at weight 15 is sometimes the same as at weight 14, but if I slowly add weight
ygData.messageBody:
I have also noticed that the penalty is based off fractions of a pound.
My AC at weight 15 is sometimes the same as at weight 14, but if I
slowly add weight (such as with coins), my AC starts to go down before I
actually get to a full 16 weight.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Justin Maupin [SMTP:lord_skye@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 3:58 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Pls explain AC
>
> From: Justin Maupin <lord_skye@...>
>
> with my strength at 90 I take the hit between 14 and
> 15 but with a strength of 92 its between 15 and 16 go
> figure...
>
